summary: This document is a brief email chain from August 2, 2019, discussing the location and scanning of 'message pads' that are in evidence. The correspondence involves individuals from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Fantastic
persons.context: Initiates the email chain by asking if 'message pads' in evidence have been shipped to New York.

events.title: Email exchange about evidence scanning
events.description: Email correspondence confirms that 'message pads' in evidence have been located and that scanning work on them is underway.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 2, 2019, concerning evidence in an investigation.
The subject of the emails is 'message pads' that are in evidence and their scanning status.
The correspondence involves the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The emails confirm the message pads have been located and scanning work is in progress.
